name: Inactive
description: The card has been issued, but the Accountholder has not activated the card yet.

name: Active
description: The card is active and is able to use for normal transactions.

name: Suspended
description: The card has been placed in a suspended state, probably due to a negative status with the Accountholder.

name: Expired
description: The card is past the expiry date.  Expired cards effectively deactivated.

name: Closed
description: The card has been closed by an account administrator or by request of the Accountholder.
